data.text: Harigi tuk mben, Fherasiŋ gumgi mbari, Zudaiŋ tɨvi vhuuiŋ kaŋgi gumgi mbari, mbe Zerusareman kegap zerav, mbe wari thɨgap Zisas han zav ana phok thɨgi.
7.2: Ru 11.38Mbe maaŋ kav, Zisas phorga rui gumgi mbari garim, mbe mben nzɨgi tɨva zɨn vuav fari ruagiap mba pi fhu. Mbe fhura mba pi.
7.3: Mk 7.5; 7.8; Zo 2.6; Ga 1.14Mba Fherasiŋ gumgi gum mba Zudaiŋ gumgi, mbe won nzɨgi tɨva suiravra ki. Mbe fari ruagiap, za pi. Mbe fhura mban mbegɨrga tuktɨgi fhu.
7.4: Mt 23.25Mbe vhɨra phogar kegɨp ndigi zegɨrga mba, mbe fhura ntan mbegɨrga tuktɨgi fhu. Mbe nta ruagiap, za nta pi.

Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap, mba Fherasiŋ gumgi gum mba Zudaiŋ tɨvi vhuuiŋ kaŋgi gumgi, mbe mba tɨva gangiap, Zisasan nzarigi, “Ndu phorga rui gumgi, mbe ram muuŋgiap nzɨgi tɨva zɨn ŋgɨv fari rua thav, fhura mba pi?”

Mbe mba nzambaran Zisas ga muuŋgim, Zisas mbe ŋgarkarav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde fhura bigir wari ga shɨshɨgi gumgi ma. Fhum Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma Aisaia, ana guigira nde mbui tɨvi bun nzuav kherav khaŋ suaŋgi,
Mbe fhura shɨshɨga na zɨ ndi vun kuamkuav, guma suaŋgi tɨvi, nde ntan wari khɨvav fhura khaŋ nzuai, “Kheiŋ Fhe Bakɨme nzuai tɨvi ma.” ’7.6-7 Ais 29.13
Nde maaŋ mbuav, Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨvi, nde nta kuegap, wari wo nzɨgi suaŋgi tɨvi, nde ntara suirigi.”
Ana ne mbe nzuav, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde tɨvar vhuuŋ guarira mbuav ki. Nde kha tɨva mbuav, Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvi ndi mbu gaa khɨngiap, nde won nzɨgi tɨvara zɨn vui.

7.10: Kis 20.12; 21.17; Wkp 20.9; Lo 5.16; Mt 15.4Moses khaŋ nde nzuai, ‘Nde wo ndegi gu ndegmbori buni mbararav, mbe piin kɨri. Guma the buna mbatɨga thuen wo niamuuŋ gu ndia ga suaŋgirga, nde mba guma shogirim, ana rimgiri.’

Nde khaŋ nzuai, ‘Guma the wo niamuuŋ gu ndiar kurkura zav tɨgi ŋkɨɨ, ana ntan manin kurkura thav, vov khaŋ mani ga nzuai, “Mba ŋkon kurkura zav tɨgi ŋkɨɨ, nta Koban ma.” ’ (Koban nɨɨeŋ khaŋ nzuai, ‘Fhe Bakɨmen nɨɨnga ne. Gu ntan Fhe Bakɨmen mbuigi.’)
Nde maaŋ mbe nzuav, guma the bigɨna then wo niamuuŋ gu ndiar kurarga tuktɨgi fhu.
Nde maaŋ mbuav, wari wo nzɨgi han ndigi tɨvi, nde nta zɨn vov, Fhe Bakɨme nzuai tɨvi, nde nta mbevigi, nta vergi. Nde mba khesharigi tɨvi vhɨrve, nde nta mbui.”
Zisas mbara taagia mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrver kamgim, mbe ana han zim, ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde za na mbararari. Gu khar nde nzuai buni, nde nta ndiv wari wo ndɨkndɨgir tɨgɨri.

7.15-16: FG 10.14-15Bigɨn the kɨrar kegap, guma ndav vhen vergap, anan ndava vhee muuŋgim, ana nzaŋnzaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhu. Mba guma ndav vhen kegap kɨrar hi bigi, ana ndava vhee muuŋgim, ana nzaŋnzaŋgi.” 7.15-16 Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ garav nta kaŋgi gumgi mbari, mbe kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, harigi kama mueŋ phorga khar ki. Mba kameŋ khaŋ muuŋgi suambara mbui, “Guma khuarani kɨv ana mbararari.”
Zisas mba bunin mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve ga suaŋgiap, mbe thav vov, wo phena vhen vergi. Ana wo phena vhen verga kim, ana phorga rui gumgi ana mba suaŋgi buni nɨɨŋge nzuav, anan nzai.

Zisas mbaram khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Ee, nde vhɨra mba kameŋ ndi sagi fhuve?” Ana thav mben nzarigi, “Nde khueŋ kaŋgi fhuve? Guma pi mba, nta ana kamthoon bumgum, ana ndava thoon veri. Mba mba, ana ndava mbuim, ana nzaŋnzai fhu.
Mba mba vhɨra guma tuman vhen veri fhuvara. Nta ana mbun veri. Ana zumgum nta vhigi.” (Zisas khaŋ muuŋgia tɨga nza nzuai, ne khaŋ muuŋgi, nza kha pi mba, nta za pi mbara.)
Ana ne mbe nzua vov khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Guma ndava vhen kegap kɨrar hi bigi, ana mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi, nta mba guma ndava vhee mbuim, ana nzaŋnzaŋgi.
Guma ndav vhen kegap kɨrar hi tɨvi khare, ndɨkndɨgi mbatɨgi, ruarin mbigi gu gumgi wari ndi, bigi kɨɨi, guma shogi rimgi,

ruarin mani ga rɨgi, mbigi gu gumgi kɨɨi, bigi ga nzuav thagine mbui, bigi farfagi tɨvi, bigi guiguigi, fhura ferfera rui, bigi garav rɨmani mbɨ tui, harigi gumgi zɨrir farfagi, wo ndi vun kuamkuagi, fhura ŋanŋana tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui.
Kha khesharigi tɨvi mbatɨgi, nta zam guma ndava vhen kegap kɨrar hi, nta anan ndava vhee muuŋgim, ana nzaŋnzaŋgi.”
Zisas mba suaŋgi buni nɨɨŋge bun wo phorga rui gumgi ga suaŋgiap, maaŋ thav, Taia fhain ndagi. Ana ndav, phena mbe vhen vergap, wo vhagi. Ana wo vhagirga tuktɨgi fhu.
Ana maaŋ kim, mbiga mbe, anan kambik ŋina mbatɨk ana vhen ndagi, mba mbik Zisas maaŋ ki ne mbararagiap, thav Zisas han zi. Ana zav, wo fegap Zisas ŋkarveni nɨma khɨngi.
Mba mbik Sairofonisia fhaiŋ mbik ma, ana Grik kamara nzuai. Ana khaŋ tɨgav wo kambiga tɨn mba ŋina mbatɨga vharvhara zav Zisas ga nzuai.
Zisas mbaram khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu fharav mba tari vuzvugi mban mben nɨɨŋgirim, mbe fharav ntan mbegɨri. Khe tɨvar vhuuŋ fhuvara. Ndu thaŋ nzuav tarir mba fua feiŋ ga sui?”
Mba mbik ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Ahaŋ, Guma Rum, ndu nzerara nzuai. Feiŋ vhɨra mba kaar piin kav mba tari pi phɨreri fɨgiveiŋ pi.”
Zisas mbaram khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu maaŋ na suaŋgi, ndu taagi wo phenan ŋgɨri. Mba ŋina mbatɨk ndu kambik thav kɨrar hɨgi.”
Ana taagia wo phenan vov gari, ana kambik wo kaa ga rɨgap ki. Ana ana gangiap, kaŋgi, mba ŋina mbatɨk ana thav kɨrar hɨgi.
Zisas maaŋ kegap, mba Taia fhaiŋ thav khavgia ndai. Ana nda vov Saidon sharav, taagia verav, mba Dikapores fhain sharav Gariri mbɨ gaar vergi.
7.32: Mt 9.32; Ru 11.14Ana vugap maaŋ kim, gumgi mbari khuarani ŋangiap buni suambara kakagi guma mbe ndigap, ana han zɨgi. Mbe zegap, farven ana sur zav khaŋ tɨgav Zisas ga nzuai.

Zisas mbaram mba guman kov mba gumgi vhɨrve thav, mani nuanira gaar vugap, ana mbaram wo farafenin mba khuarani ŋangi guma khuarani ga rugi. Ana wo farafenin mba guma khuarani ga ruga kegap, ni sigap, mbara wo farafe pargiap, mba guma ze khɨngi.

7.34: Mk 6.41; Zo 11.33; 11.38; 11.41; 17.1Ana farafen mba guma ze khɨngiap, khoga buiva garav, ana ndava vhee guigira mba guma ga nzuav nziav, khaŋ mba guma ga nzuai, “Epata!” Mba kama nɨɨeŋ khaŋ nzuai, “Fhogɨ!”
7.35: Ais 35.5-6; Mt 11.5Zisas maaŋ mba guma ga muuŋŋgim, ana khuarani taagia bigi mbararagi. Ana bigi mbararav, ana ze bɨkbɨɨgim, ana taagia tuituigia buni nzuai.
Zisas mbaram kama havharar mba bigeŋ bun suangen mbe thɨvigi. Ana mbe thɨvara kim, mbe pim ne bun nzuai.

7.37: Ais 35.5Mbe ne bun nzuaim, mba gumgi gu mbigi ne mbararagiap, guigira ŋgava mbatɨga muuŋgiap, thɨri tuigap, khaŋ nzuai, “Ana za kha bigi ga mbuav nzerara nta mbui guma ma. Ana khuarani ŋangi guman muuŋgirim, ana taagi buni mbararagi. Ana vhɨra buni suangeŋ kakagi guman muuŋgirim, ana taagi tuituigia buni nzuai.”
